name: Westerlands: Girly runaways story
description:
Have you ever staged a jailbreak? Or ran away from the sheriff in the wild west?

You have the opportunity to experience something completely new, run with the character through the desert and city in the wild west, fleeing the police and the sheriff, while actually running with the VR headset on. But you will not be alone, a charming companion who saved you from prison is running with you. Run, collect coins, dodge obstacles, use weapons. Beat passers-by, get various bonuses for this, for example, acceleration. But the most important thing is to run and not fall into the hands of the sheriff. Test yourself for strength.

Key Features:
Say no to buttons and joysticks! Grab your controllers and run into a new adventure world! An endlessly generated level literally, there is no end to the road. Become the first in the rating of the game, show what you are capable of.

We look forward to your suggestions on what else we can add for more interest and pleasure.

Support us now! Tell your friends!
